Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.Utility.DebuggingTools

Class ANSIDebug

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.Utility.DebuggingTools.ANSIDebug
public abstract class ANSIDebug
extends java.lang.Object
ANSIDebug abstract Class contains colors and styles to be used by the Debugger Classes when printing debug information.
